excerpt: Discover this week's top cozy & stylish finds for spring! Fashion timeless accessories, shop the best picks that will refresh your closet.
text: This week’s top favorites—according to you! Here are the top products you loved from what I shared this week:Hunter Original Short Gloss Rain BootFrom: DSWRainy spring days call for practical yet stylish footwear, and these glossy Hunter rain boots are the perfect blend of classic and chic. Women’s Lucky Shades of Green Graphic SweaterFrom: TargetA fun and festive sweater that gives all the lucky charm vibes for spring! Cozy enough to wear now but light enough to layer on those breezy spring days. Shop it here. Jessica Simpson Women’s Cassidy Crossbody HandbagFrom: WalmartA perfect everyday crossbody that blends function with style! It pairs effortlessly with anything in your wardrobe. html:
This week’s top favorites—according to you! And it should come as no surprise that we are all feeling lighter and brighter colors, meaning we’re just holding our breath for winter to move on and let spring shine through. Here are the top products you loved from what I shared this week:

Hunter Original Short Gloss Rain Boot

From: DSW
Rainy spring days call for practical yet stylish footwear, and these glossy Hunter rain boots are the perfect blend of classic and chic. Perfect for spring days that call for puddle jumping, but I find myself reaching for these on those slushy snow days here on the farm. Check them out here!

Women’s Western Shirtdress

From: Target
This denim shirtdress is the perfect balance between casual and put-together, making it a staple piece for transitioning into spring. I love how easy it is to style—wear it with boots now and swap for sandals when the temps rise! Shop it here.

Berry Basket Earring Set

From: Target
I can’t resist a good earring set, and these berry-hued pieces add the sweetest little pop of color. Whether you wear them all together or mix and match, they bring a playful yet polished touch to any outfit. Check them out here!

Sun Post Earrings

From: Target
These sun-inspired earrings are delicate yet bold, making them the perfect finishing touch to any outfit. I love how they add just the right amount of shine! Shop them here.

Relaxed Chamonix France Graphic Crew Sweater

From: Hollister
This cozy crew sweater has that perfect vintage feel with a modern relaxed fit. It’s soft, stylish, and ideal for layering as we move into spring. Check it out here.

Strawberry Drop Multi-Strand Necklace

From: Target
I love layering jewelry, and this multi-strand necklace is such a statement piece! The delicate gold and strawberry tones feel fresh and feminine—perfect for welcoming in spring. Shop it here.

Women’s Leisure Studio Oversized Graphic Sweatshirt

From: Target
This oversized graphic sweatshirt is perfect for cozy days while still looking stylish. The relaxed fit makes it a go-to for lounging or running errands. Shop it here!

iPhone Quilt Case

From: Amazon
Do you just have an immense love for all things quilts, from snuggling under them, using them on pillows, even a reclaimed handmade quilt jacket? Don’t stop there! I found this lovely quilt-inspired phone case, and it’s absoutley the cutest. Check it out here!

Women’s Lucky Shades of Green Graphic Sweater

From: Target
A fun and festive sweater that gives all the lucky charm vibes for spring! Cozy enough to wear now but light enough to layer on those breezy spring days. Shop it here.

Jessica Simpson Women’s Cassidy Crossbody Handbag

From: Walmart
A perfect everyday crossbody that blends function with style! It pairs effortlessly with anything in your wardrobe. I am not sure how (and why) they keep dropping the price of this Crossbody and it was worth it in my opinion at full price, let alone two heavily discounted prices. Make sure you go snag this up (seriously) before this deal sells them out. This bag is the perfect size for carrying essentials without feeling bulky, and the quality is just so good for the price. It’s definitely a piece you’ll be reaching for all season long. Check it out here!

Spring is just around the corner, which means now is the perfect time to start prepping your indoor spaces and wardrobes. Refreshing your style, adding cozy layers, and grabbing a few seasonal pieces now means that when the warm weather finally arrives, we can all drop our devices and soak in the sunshine. Thank you for stopping by the blog today (and every other day!). Be sure to follow along here for more daily inspiration.

Stay Cozy
xxLizMarie
